questions.question_text: Which statement accurately describes deploying your SOA application to acluster?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Correct answer D (check SOA Suite 12c Exam Study Guide)
D. Treat your cluster as a single deployment target and let theadministration server automatically deploy the application to all themanaged servers in the cluster.

choices.C: Use WebLogic Server Administration Console for deployment because youcannot deploy to a cluster from JDeveloper.
choices.B: After deployment, restart each managed server in the cluster before theapplication is available for service.
choices.D: Treat your cluster as a single deployment target and let theadministration server automatically deploy the application to all themanaged servers in the cluster.
choices.A: Manually deploy the application to each managed server in the cluster.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AC
From https://docs.oracle.com/middleware/1213/ess/develop-scheduler/GUID-007A8FDD-C490-46A9-931B-08E5B49F8748.htm#ESSDG99951
"Oracle Enterprise Scheduler is primarily a Java EE application that provides time- and schedule-based callbacks to other applications to run their jobs"=>A
"Oracle Enterprise Scheduler...provides monitoring and management through Fusion Middleware Control."=>Not D

A: It is a Java EE application that is deployed to WebLogic Server to provide distributed job request
 processing across a single WebLogic Server or a collection of WebLogic Servers.
C: It is used extensively by Fusion Applications so it is well-tested.

questions.question_text: Which two statements are correct about the Oracle Enterprise Scheduler Service (ESS) facility?

choices.A: It is a Java EE application that is deployed to WebLogic Server to provide distributed job request processing across a single WebLogic Server or a collection of WebLogic Servers.
choices.B: It is shipped as a separate product and you can install it after you have completed the SOA Suite installation.
choices.D: It is administered via the WebLogic Server Administration Console.
choices.C: It is used extensively by Fusion Applications so it is well-tested.
